CustomField.description: Used to create Dimension 3 via ERP Messaging. If this field is populated, this will be used as the Reporting Code on the Dimension 3 record, if not then the Name of the record will be used by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to create Dimension 3 via ERP Messaging. If this field is populated, this will be used as the Reporting Code on the Dimension 3 record, if not then the Name of the record will be used by default.
CustomField.label: Reporting Code
